text: Sales is a municipality in the northern part of the state of São Paulo in Brazil. The population is 6,002 (2015 est.) in an area of 308.45 km².Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística The elevation is 448 m. ==References== ==External links== * Pagina Iniciativa Privada * Pagina da IBrasil de PropagWeb * [ Homepage of Sales] Category:Municipalities in São Paulo (state)
title: Sales, São Paulo
